action.text: Amendment SA 2208, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2208 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2208 proposed by Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S15310; text: CR S15310) to make a technical correction.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2208 proposed by Senator Frist.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2208 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
